ai-kv9.10:0.4_0: Discussion of the legal procedures for the mind,

ai-kv9.10:2.7_0: If he were killing living creatures, he had to make sure of bodily actions, not to be spoken.

ai-kv9.10:3.3_0: doesn’t prevail over the body by way of body and mind, and with the arising of thought.
ai-kv9.10:3.5_0: “Our physical deeds are uprooted by way of body and mind, but we can live together with a single one.
ai-kv9.10:4.1_0: You don’t act out of body,
ai-kv9.10:4.3_0: If he doesn’t want to go and don’t want to die, he doesn’t want to ware, nor do he wants to look back, he doesn’t want to inspect his work. He doesn’t want to wake up from his way, thinking, “Don’t want to go away,” and he replies her.
